title: 好吧我实在没辙了，也来发一发服务器崩溃，求大神T T
author: lixuanye132456
txt_content:
就是这么短啊，之前添加了NeveLag防作弊插件和 防止OP插PerDisable V1.0.1   然后开服把我这个服务都ban了 无奈再重启 就无线报错了
删除相应插件仍是无法解决 一怒之下全部插件都删了，然并卵 一直是这个报错_(:зゝ∠)_ 大神在哪里 ，快来


---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Don't be sad. I'll do better next time, I promise!

Time: 16-1-28 下午3:11
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.lang.NullPointerException: Exception in server tick loop
        at net.minecraft.server.management.UserList.func_152679_g(UserList.java:218)
        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedPlayerList.func_152620_y(SourceFile:99)
        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedPlayerList.<init>(SourceFile:25)
        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71197_b(DedicatedServer.java:235)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:620)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

replies.author: 936816697MCfans
replies.txt_content: 备份存档和插件~重新安装服务端~
